subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The only question after the P.G.A. Championship that appeared unanswered was whether Tiger Woods would play his way onto the Ryder Cup team or be a captain’s pick.
snippet: The only question after the P.G.A. Championship that appeared unanswered was whether Tiger Woods would play his way onto the Ryder Cup team or be a captain’s pick.
